message: The talk in chat at TWiT with Jeri Ellsworth was Awesome & memorable. I've created a Highlight video on the Justin.tv site of that talk. http://www.justin.tv/spaceguy/b/283065467
Hit the popout and resize, the resolution is really good. Even on my 30" fullscreen it's pretty good.
Part 2 of the Jeri Ellsworth talk. http://www.justin.tv/spaceguy/b/283070835
@spaceguy1 Very cool, thanks for creating the highlight videos!
yep, thanks for the share... i think towards the end there Leo threw the offer she cannot refuse...

I was listening to that show and then got on a train home and while I was on the train I wrote Leo an email with my idea of having her narrate her own "build" videos for the TWiT show as opposed to a live video of the build. Then when I get  off the train and turn on TWiT & Leo was already discussing that with her. She wants to come to TWiT so bad, I can tell. She just needs to figure out a way she doesn't lose everything she built up in Portland. I think she can also build a robot that speaks random sentences from chat and chat people can randomly control movements of.
New Jeri Ellsworth video links http://bit.ly/jeritwit1 and http://bit.ly/jeritwit2 easier too remember
